name: View Significant Info Questions References for Customer

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930000403000"

When I fetch the customer significant info for cifKey
| cifKey |
| 0100000930000403000 |

Then the following customer significant info should be returned
| date | event | nscAccount | displayOrder | category | priority | description | list |
| 02/01/2015 | 32 |  | 1 | Service | 4 | Were you aware you now have eStatements on your accounts? We can switch off the papers statements for you on the Kiosk if you like? | PAST |
| 18/08/2015 | 43 |  | 4 | Service | 1 | May I please confirm your date of birth for our records? Note: DOB should be verified using valid indentification & updated on Clientview | FUTURE |
| 18/08/2015 | 44 |  | 3 | Service | 2 | Were you aware AIB now have Banking apps for Smartphones and tablets? They are available on the Apple App Store or the Google Play Store | FUTURE |
| 18/08/2015 | 45 |  | 2 | Service | 3 | Were you aware that you can send money between mobile phones using AIB's Me2U app. You can register on Internet Banking and then download the app from the Apple App Store or the Google play store | FUTURE |
